#summary 如何训练crf2模型

= 生成语料 =

{{{
wget -O - http://nlpbamboo.googlecode.com/files/people-daily.txt.gz | gzip -cd > people-daily.txt
$bin/pdc_normalize -v people-daily.txt > normalized.txt
$bin/crf2_tool -i normalized.txt -o pd_crf2_training.txt
}}}


= 训练 =

{{{
crf_learn -t -c 4.0 -f 2 $training/crf2.tmpl pd_crf2_training.txt crf2.model
}}}
